context-param.description: The context for the FutureGateway API initialises the file cache directory and the thread pools for the job management. The following parameters should be specified: - CacheDir: path where files are temporary stored. Default value is 'FutureGatewayData' directory outside the webapp directory; - SubmissionThreadPoolSize: size of thread pool used for the task submission. The maximum size is the 4 times this value. Default value is 10.
